Posts.Content: Shaunagee90 wrote: hello! I am 6 weeks postpartum with my third baby and am 27 years old. I have had a red itching rash/patch in my left breast for just over a week now. I have tried several methods to clear it up but nothing is working. I am heading to see my doctor today but of course have been on Dr. google. All the info I can find on persistent breast rashes is linked to IBC. Wondering if anyone has any insight on this or has any words of advice. I hate being so anxious Thank you all x Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about IBC Shaunagee90 Kicks
